original_text: “‘If anyone strikes someone a fatal blow with an iron object, that person is a murderer; the murderer is to be put to death.
korean_text: 만일 철 연장으로 사람을 쳐죽이면 그는 살인자니 그 살인자를 반드시 죽일 것이요

sentences.original_text: If anyone strikes someone a fatal blow
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 누군가 다른 사람에게 치명적인 타격을 가하면

sentences.original_text: the murderer is to be put to death
